# Overview {-}

This is the handbook for STAT601.  Details of the course structure,
including assessment and timetables, may be found on AUTonline.

```robin.hankin@aut.ac.nz``` 

The whole course is based around R and RStudio which may be downloaded from 

```https://cran.r-project.org/```

and

```https://www.rstudio.com/```

respectively.

This course lectures have been recorded and are available on YouTube at:

```https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL018X5Hlr4RkgE65Pg93TFY-32KCVpW84```

which you may view at your leisure.  Note that the course as delivered
will vary slightly from the YouTube videos and in particular the
material might be presented in a different order.

The videos are also available in a slightly different format on
Mediasite.  To view, log in to AUTonline and then

```content system -> institution -> learn -> maths```

takes you to a number of mathematical resources, including the videos
which are at ```STAT601```.


This manual is distributed under the GNU GPL and is available at

```https://github.com/RobinHankin/stat601```

Please feel free to send corrections, bug reports, fanmail, etc to the issues page

```https://github.com/RobinHankin/stat601/issues```
